metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6728 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The ApiBase::getWatchlistUser function in MediaWiki before 1.23.10, 1.24.x before 1.24.3, and 1.25.x before 1.25.2 does not perform token comparison in constant time, which allows remote attackers to guess the watchlist token and bypass CSRF protection via a timing attack.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6728` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1.27.4-3
mediawiki-classes - 1.27.4-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.27.4-3').
